en.play_help: Plays a song or playlist from YouTube or Spotify.
en.stop_help: Stops the playback and clears the queue.
en.lyrics_help: Displays the lyrics of the current song.
en.loop_help: Toggles looping of the current song.
en.search_help: Searches for a song and lets you choose which one to play.
